sentences.en: " Yes; I am little Pearl! " repeated the child, continuing her antics. "
sentences.cn: " 是啊! 我是小珠儿! " 孩子又说了一遍, 同时继续着她的调皮动作.
伊丽莎白容忍了萨拉的搞怪。

sentences.en: Everyone laughed at his foolish antics.
sentences.cn: 大家都笑他那种愚蠢的滑稽动作.

sentences.en: His fast-paced novels are full of bizarre situations and madcap antics.
sentences.cn: 他那些快节奏的小说里充满了怪诞的场景和荒唐的行为。

sentences.en: I don't know how his parents put up with his antics.
sentences.cn: 我不知道他的父母是如何忍受他的怪异行为.

sentences.en: I eventually grew tired of his antics on the tennis court.
sentences.cn: 他在网球场上的古怪动作终于使我厌烦了.

sentences.en: President Bush has caught the public eye with his antics.
sentences.cn: 公众已经注意到布什总统的滑稽举动.

sentences.en: The antics of the monkeys at the zoo made everyone fall about.
sentences.cn: 动物园中猴子的滑稽动作引得大家捧腹大笑.

sentences.en: The bank staff got up to all sorts of antics to raise money for charity.
sentences.cn: 银行职员使出各种可笑的花招为慈善事业筹款。

sentences.en: The comedian's antics left the audience panting for more of the same thing.
sentences.cn: 那位喜剧演员的滑稽动作使观众看了还想再看.
这猴子做出几种滑稽动作.

sentences.en: The youngsters got up to all sorts of amusing antics.
sentences.cn: 这些年轻人做出各种各样可笑的蠢事.

sentences.en: Their antics never fail to amuse.
sentences.cn: 他们滑稽的举止总是让人发笑。

sentences.en: Under the guise of active wits they will lead us to the parental meditation of antics.
sentences.cn: 而且他们还会披上活跃的智慧的外衣,引导我们以慈父的目光看待他们的恶作剧.

sentences.en: We were all highly amused by the comedian's antics.
sentences.cn: 小丑的滑稽表演逗得我们哈哈大笑.

sentences.en: We’re all growing tired of his childish antics.
sentences.cn: 我们都厌倦了他那些幼稚的滑稽举动。

trans.tran_cn: 古怪、可笑的举动，滑稽动作，古怪姿态，愚蠢的、可能会带来问题的行为
trans.tran_en: behaviour that seems strange, funny, silly, or annoying
